txt.en: 'A group of Dourhands has come to Vérnozal.'
'Good riddance to those Dourhands. They certainly overstayed their welcome!'

'Good riddance to those Dourhands. They certainly overstayed their welcome! I believe everyone was glad to see them off. The Hall of Vérnozal is not a filthy inn, suitable only for drunken revelry, but a great beacon of Gundabad reclaimed!'
Vérnozal can be found in Máttugard, by the Steepset.\n\nPrince Ingór wishes to talk to you.
Monsters in this mission will enrage at low morale, gaining attack strength and attack speed.
'Remember to be friendly with those Dourhands. I do not want any unpleasant incidents in this hall, [placeholder]. Be careful.'
You have pledged to lend your aid and your adventuring skills to the Zhélruka and to fight on their behalf in Gundabad.

'[placeholder], a group of Dourhands has come to Vérnozal. We could not send them elsewhere, as it is now the way of the Zhélruka to be kind to all dwarves in Gundabad. I ask you to cater to them, as much as is advisable, but also to keep an eye upon them. I do not entirely trust these newcomers.'
Vérnozal can be found in Máttugard, by the Steepset.\n\nPrince Ingór wishes to talk to you.
